function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Fragmentation of employment services and vocational training creates challenges for displaced workers","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of temporary migrants from economic stimulus and welfare packages","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Creation of an underclass of migrant workers","category":"Social","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited utility of new policy measures for temporary migrants","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal impact of government measures on young workers and immigrants","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of migrant workers to exploitation and abuse","category":"Social","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusionary migration policy exacerbating socio-economic disparities","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise of insecure work arrangements including casual, fixed term, and market-mediated arrangements","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High unemployment rates and long-term unemployment","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hysteresis in the labor market","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in people queuing in front of centrelink offices","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Job losses of 14%-25% with low-income workers twice as likely to be affected","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Systematic flaws in the operation of state enforcement regimes, resulting in widespread employer non-compliance","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of concerted and coordinated global effort","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divisions in europe exacerbating due to pandemic response differences","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Opposition to mutual co-financing of public expenditures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of demand in the economy due to the covid-19 crisis","category":"Economy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure of irresponsible government policies and decline of industrial sectors","category":"Economy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential repetition of covid-19 type events in the future","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health workers facing physical and mental health risks due to long working hours and shortage of protective equipment.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionate burden on women to combine paid work, unpaid domestic work, and home-schooling children.","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Escalation of domestic violence during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Alteration of parenting agreements causing increased family stress and strain on courts during the pandemic.","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased managerial prerogative allowing changes to employees’ duties and work arrangements.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Women in feminised sectors at risk of continued exposure to the virus","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of strict health and safety measures in health and social work sectors","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cultural insensitivity in health response and decision-making","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender inequality and economic impact on women","category":"Economy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor nutrition and inadequate housing infrastructure heighten susceptibility to the pandemic within indigenous communities.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High rates of crowding and inadequate access to water in indigenous communities contribute to the difficulty of practicing social distancing and personal hygiene.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of domestic violence due to housing and financial stress within indigenous communities during the pandemic.","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionately high incidence rates of disease among first nations peoples","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Food insecurity and famine due to lockdowns and other crises","category":"Economy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Governments failing to prepare for the magnitude of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprecedented demand for critical resources","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of sars cov-2 infection","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial strain preventing industries from investing in iot","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in energy consumption from commercial buildings to homes due to covid-19 lifestyle changes","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unwillingness or inability to invest in specialized medical devices or wearables","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on expensive research-grade wearable devices","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Obstacles in smart home iot adoption due to cost and technical skills requirement","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable technology not optimized for different groups with different lifestyles and circumstances, leading to discomfort and potential health issues.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decentralized data pools at personal devices may lead to privacy concerns and unauthorized data access.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low threshold healthcare iot services may lead to inaccurate or unreliable medical data.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cheap and easy-to-install iot sensors and devices","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial constraints leading to reduced investment in iot projects","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing labor costs for device installation under social contact restrictions","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Magnified shortcomings in iot technology during the pandemic, such as ease of device installation and data security","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluctuating demands for medical equipment","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Behavioral shifts in individuals and organizations","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"}]}
